overview: Daddy's in for a treat, because his naughty little stepdaughter is down to fuck! Join Megan Rain, Carter Cruise, Sara Luvv, Adria Rae, Katie St. Ives and more cock-craving cuties in over 5 hrs. 10 mins. of delicious taboo encounters. With looks that kill and an attitude to match, it's hard to resist daddy's little monster.
title: Daddy's Little Monster
